title: Replace keyboard macbook retina
message: It is possible to replace keyboard in Macbook A1286 - 15 from 2012 retina or I need to buy this: [url]http://www.ebay.es/itm/MacBook-Pro-Retina-A1398-15-2-3-Mid-2012-Palmrest-Keyboard-US-Battery-/272441934011?hash=item3f6ece00bb:g:pCAAAOSwMVdYIR95[/url]

title: Replace keyboard macbook retina
message:
You can rip out the old one, then remove all the rivets and use screws to put in the new one. But at 65 that is pretty cheap for a complete topcase with battery. 
Also A1286 from 2012 is not a Retina. A1398 is the retina

title: Replace keyboard macbook retina
message: Yes, it is A1398. Can I use screws from A1286 or they are different?
